full_summary:
# Tender for Genetic Analyzer System
## Reference Number
WS4038438417
## Solicitation Number
WS4038438417
## Publication Date
June 8, 2023
## Tender Closing Date and Time
June 26, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time, EDT)
**Note:** All bids must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. Bids received after 14:00:00 EDT will be considered non-responsive.

## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal to supply, deliver, and provide training on a new Genetic Analyzer System to the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

## Scope of Work
The contract requires the delivery of one (1) new Genetic Analyzer System, along with training to PHAC personnel. The bidder must ensure compliance with all technical specifications and requirements listed in the tender documentation.

## Selection Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price criterion. The bidder with the lowest overall price proposal, which meets all the requirements specified in the tender documentation, will be selected for the contract.

## Associated Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Points of Contact
For more information about the tender, please contact Sallie Boutin at the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC):
Email: [sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not available
Fax: Not available

## Related Documentation
*Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform.*
**Access the tender on Ariba Discovery:**
